repairedDockerfile:
FROM bentojs/bentojs-node 

RUN useradd --user-group --create-home --shell /bin/false app 

ENV HOME=/home/app 
ENV NODE_ENV=production 

COPY package.json $HOME/api/ 
RUN chown -R app:app $HOME/* 

USER app 
WORKDIR $HOME/api 
RUN npm set progress=false && npm install --no-optional && npm cache clean --force;

USER root 
COPY . $HOME/api 
RUN chown -R app:app $HOME/* 
USER app 

RUN node build.js 

CMD [ "npm", "run", "start" ]
